channel.title: Quick Posts on Conor's Bandon Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Quick Posts on Conor's Bandon Blog

item.title: I want exoskeletons not VR goggles
item.description: Back in the blogging heyday I would sometimes post a few times per day. Sadly it’s been a few times per year for close to a decade now, with social taking over. I’m going to experiment a bit with reverting to quick posts that normally end up on Twitter or Threads. I must also use ChatGPT o3 to build a simple posting tool for the Hugo system this blog runs on, that doesn’t require me to change how I do everything.
